functionality_rules.audio_handling: Use native Audio API or a reliable React hook. Must support auto-play (user interaction required first time).
functionality_rules.schedule_logic: Check time every second. Match HH:mm:ss exactly for triggers. Handle day of week logic (Mon-Thu vs Fri).
functionality_rules.notifications: Request Notification permission on Start. Send notification 1 minute before event.
functionality_rules.state_management: Persist 'isRunning' state in localStorage so refresh doesn't kill the scheduler (optional, but good for reliability).

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. Setup the 'ScheduleContext' to manage the global timer and audio state.
2. Create a 'ScheduleConfig' object/file that defines the rules (07:50 Blok Nasional, etc).
3. Build the 'Dashboard' layout using the Bento Grid strategy.
4. Implement the 'AudioPlayer' component that is invisible but handles the logic.
5. Use the provided image URL as a background for the main status card with an overlay.
6. Ensure the 'Start' button is prominent. The system cannot auto-play audio without user interaction first.
7. Add a 'Test Audio' button to verify sound is working.
8. Use 'sonner' for toast notifications when an event triggers.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur)
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all. This results in breaking transforms. Always add transitions for specific interactive elements like button, input excluding transforms
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add .App { text-align: center; } in the css file. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style
